response.original_title: Two Alphas Are in Love with Me
response.overview: The wolfless Lyra, has been captive in the Wolfsbane pack for seven years, during which she was constantly abused by Alpha Roland. During one of her escapes, Lyra has an accidental one-night stand with Alpha Alfred, Moonshadow pack's strongest Alpha, and becomes pregnant with his child. Alpha Alfred rescues Lyra from Alpha Roland and brings her back to his pack. To protect her, Alfred and Lyra form a Fake Luna contract.
response.title: Two Alphas Are in Love with Me
